languages.text: "Леди Кассия, вы тоже пострадавшая сторона. Как бы вы поступили на моем месте?"

traits.locale_text: "Леди Кассия, вы тоже пострадавшая сторона. Как бы вы поступили на моем месте?"

languages.text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"
languages.original_text: "Леди Кассия, вы тоже пострадавшая сторона. Как бы вы поступили на моем месте?"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are the injured party. What would you do in my place?"
"Lady Cassia, you too are the injured party. What would you do in my place?"
"Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"
"Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"
"Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

languages.text: “卡西娅女士，你也是这起袭击的受害者。如果换做你是我，你会怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅女士，你也是这起袭击的受害者。如果换做你是我，你会怎么做？”

languages.text: «Lady Cassia, usted también es una víctima en todo esto. ¿Qué haría en mi lugar?».
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: «Lady Cassia, usted también es una víctima en todo esto. ¿Qué haría en mi lugar?».

languages.text: 「カシアもこの件で傷ついた当事者だ。私の立場なら、どうする？」
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: 「カシアもこの件で傷ついた当事者だ。私の立場なら、どうする？」

languages.text: "Lady Cassia, auch Ihr seid in dieser Sache eine geschädigte Partei. Was würdet Ihr an meiner Stelle tun?"
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, auch Ihr seid in dieser Sache eine geschädigte Partei. Was würdet Ihr an meiner Stelle tun?"

languages.text: « Dame Cassia, vous aussi êtes une victime dans cette affaire. Que feriez-vous à ma place ? »
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: « Dame Cassia, vous aussi êtes une victime dans cette affaire. Que feriez-vous à ma place ? »

languages.text: "Leydi Cassia, yaşanan olaylarda zarar görenlerden biri de sendin. Benim yerimde olsan sen ne yapardın?"
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, you too are an injured party in this. What would you do in my place?"

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Cassia, yaşanan olaylarda zarar görenlerden biri de sendin. Benim yerimde olsan sen ne yapardın?"
